info.name: Minimal Dark Scrollbar - Chrome Only
info.description: A minimal dark scrollbar replacement for Chrome only.
info.additionalInfo:
Initial release.

This scrollbar was made to work in conjunction with the following Chrome theme:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/material-incognito-dark-t/ahifcnpnjgbadkjdhagpfjfkmlapfoel
